actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in Crawford, County, Ark., to the record owners of the surface of that property.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell and quitclaim specified mineral interests of the United States in property in Crawford County, Arkansas, to the record owners of the surface of such property. Directs the Secretary to require of the property owners herein covered a money deposit to cover the administrative costs of such conveyance.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in Crawford, County, Ark., to the record owners of the surface of that property.
